summary: Gives each buyable horse unique stats to make horse choice more than just cosmetic.
descriptionHtml:
[i]Also available on [url=http://steamcommunity.com/sharedfiles/filedetails/?id=127972329]Steam![/url][/i]

-------------
Installation
-------------

Download with NMM

OR

Manually extract to Skyrim/Data folder.

--------------- 
Description 
--------------- 

This mod acts as a little tweak to the default horses you can purchase. Normally, your choice of horse is purely cosmetic but this mod adds unique stats and whatnot to each of the buyable horses making where you buy your horse actually matter. 

The tweaks are pretty small but should be noticable enough. For immersion\'s sake and whatnot, to learn about the various breeds of horses, you have to read a book I added to the Whiterun Stables. It\'s at the back of the stables themselves on a barrel, you should be able to find it easily enough. 


----- 
Info 
----- 

Version: 1.0 
Original Release: 2/17/13 
Last Update: 2/17/13 
Authors: Sylvanicus 
Requirements: Skyrim 


----------------- 
Compatibility 
----------------- 

Very likely INCOMPATIBLE with other horse related mods. Should work fine with cosmetic mods but any that alter the actual attributes of the horses themselves may be incompatible. 


----------------- 
Future Plans 
----------------- 

-Add more breeds buyable from additional stables. 
-Add unique appearances to all the breeds. 
-Add a small quest to breed a custom horse. 


-------------- 
Changelog 
-------------- 

N/A
author: Sylvanicus
